boardgame.name: New Dawn
boardgame.description: And the story continues..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Twenty years after the Alliance was formed, the cost of constructing new space stations is becoming unbearable. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In order to improve the economy, the Alliance has decided to rebuild and recolonize some of the planets and space facilities who were abandoned during the war. By activating them once more, the Alliance is hoping to acquire the much needed funds and resources._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In New Dawn _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; a thematic sequel to Among the Stars and part of the Among the Stars Universe series _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; players take the role of Alliance officials. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Their assignment is to explore and revive a galactic sector. By developing various technologies and dispatching ambassadors, each player has the chance to visit abandoned planets, military facilities and space stations and establish bases to maintain control. Competition is fierce, and each mistake in maintaining control can cost dearly..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Both New Dawn and Among the Stars: Revival are compatible with the Among The Stars: Miniatures Pack accessory, which brings even more thematic elements and a great look to your games in the Among the Stars Universe._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It is a... New Dawn. Will you be part of the solution, or will you be part of the problem?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #12: New Dawn, The Manhattan Project, Legacy _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; The Bloody Inn
The Game Pit: Episode 25 - Treasure Hunt - Part Two

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: NIS. Kickstarter version includes all bonus material + custom tuck boxes for all of the cards (a $6.00 value) Will ship USPS priority flat rate.

Reserved for Diarmud Like new. Open and played twice. This is the kickstarter edition with all non add-on stretch goals. Shipping will be $12 USPS Flat Rate.
KS copy in shrinkwrap. Includes - Base game - U-Cannon - Bonus game material (KS generated stretch goals) Buyer to pay PayPal fees. Bank transfer also possible.

Note - Selling on behalf of non BGG friend. Can provide pictures etc of item. Unplayed Kickstarter version. Will ship to UK only. Shipping via Myhermes direct to your door including tracking, £5. Payment via paypal. Will combine shipping with other items for lower cost where possible.
